text: Hey team, just wanted to flag that we are seeing some permission denied errors when trying to mount the S3 bucket.
Hi Mike, can you check if the instance profile has the 's3:ListBucket' permission? That's a common gotcha.
Good catch Sarah, we missed that one in the policy. Updating it now.
Works now! Thanks. Also, for the bronze layer, should we use Autoloader or just standard read?
Definitely Autoloader. It will handle the schema evolution and file notification much better for your streaming requirements.
